summary: On a pilgrimage to Mashad from Tehran, a couple's transportation breaks down, far from any major town. The husband, a photographer, seeks help at a nearby village and encounters a teacher ... See full summary »
cast: Leila Hatami|Nezam Manouchehri|Mehran Rajabi|Mahmood Pakniat|Mohsen Behdaneh|Mohammad Beigy
title: Istgah-Matrouk
